metadata.name: Invoke-Obfuscation VAR++ LAUNCHER OBFUSCATION
metadata.comment: Detects Obfuscated Powershell via VAR++ LAUNCHER

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('&&set')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cmd')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/c')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-f')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('{0}')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('{1}')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('{2}')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('{3}')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('{4}')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('{5}'))))

output.summary: Detects Obfuscated Powershell via VAR++ LAUNCHER
